img_above_text:
![Wukong Longevity 17.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/2/2e/Wukong_Longevity_17.jpg)
The most important note is that you can find another Dark-faced Overlord here. Keep focusing on battering his legs to get him to fall and you can attack his skull, and when he dies he'll drop the Gold Spikeplate Curio!
img_below_text:
Be sure to inspect the woods behind where the giant was posted, and you'll find one last Crow Diviner guarding a **Treasure Chest** with some materials inside.
![Wukong Longevity 19.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/e/e2/Wukong_Longevity_19.jpg)

content.text:
You are given an image and related metadata and context.

            Image Position:
            - This is 114 from the file 'Valley_of_Ecstasy_Walkthrough.md'.

            Context:
            - Preceding Text: "![Wukong Longevity 17.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/2/2e/Wukong_Longevity_17.jpg)
The most important note is that you can find another Dark-faced Overlord here. Keep focusing on battering his legs to get him to fall and you can attack his skull, and when he dies he'll drop the Gold Spikeplate Curio!"
            - Following Text: "Be sure to inspect the woods behind where the giant was posted, and you'll find one last Crow Diviner guarding a **Treasure Chest** with some materials inside.
![Wukong Longevity 19.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/e/e2/Wukong_Longevity_19.jpg)"

            Your task:
            1. Generate a **short, clear, and informative English summary** of the image.
            2. Focus primarily on the **preceding and following text** to infer the image's **purpose, content, or narrative role**.

img_summary: The image depicts a scene from the game "Black Myth: Wukong" where the player character is engaged in combat with a Dark-faced Overlord in a snowy forest setting. The preceding text mentions the importance of defeating this enemy to obtain the Gold Spikeplate Curio, while the following text advises players to explore the woods behind the defeated giant to find a Crow Diviner guarding a treasure chest. The image serves to illustrate the encounter with the Dark-faced Overlord and the environment where this battle takes place.
